description: It's Hogtied's first shoot in the Armory and sexy 19 year old Sasha Grey is our willing talent. Hogtied presents a fantasy.After college classes Sasha's friends dare her to go into an old historic building. After all, the door was open... Soon she gets lost in the maze of passages and corridors. Is someone else there? What was it that she just heard? Someone, something, behind her? Or was it all in her imagination? Sasha decides it's time to leave, but can she find her way back out?
title: Sasha Grey Chased and Captured
